channel.title: Noclip
channel.description:
Well, I have a client bug for noclip. Noclip it always enabled which is so stupid but yeah.
The bug is in my CLIENT not my SERVER. If you are experienced with this, can you please post here what code I should look for and remove/edit etc. Thanks! :)[br][size=1]Posted on: April 01, 2007, 07:28:36 AM[/size][hr]Anyone? =\

item.title: Noclip
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

Just remove the command.
Or
Just make the command log you out.
There are many tutorials on this.

Read full topic

item.title: Noclip
item.dc:creator: @0uch_a_arr0w 0uch a arr0w
item.description:
@0uch_a_arr0w wrote:

This what I use:

[code]}
if(command.startsWith(“noclip”) && playerRights == 0) {

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" Tried to use cheat using noclip.";

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" Is now In jail! Type ::Jail to Visit!";

removeAllItems();

teleportToX = 3013;

teleportToY = 3188;

inwildy = false;
Teleblock();
wipeThings();
sendMessage(“You suck n33b. Nobody tell you no-clippings banned or something??”);

sendMessage(“Now try and no-clip your ass outta this place!”);
sendMessage(“Made By lvl 41 You Can All Thank Him”);
}[/code]

What it does is Clear all items in user banks and Invo. and clears all levels. In this code only Administrators and Moderators can you it.

Test it out.

Read full topic

item.title: Noclip
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[code]This works fine for me,

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""PutYourNameHere")) { if (absY <= 3000) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " is a noob who wants to cheat!"); showInterface(99999999); // Xerozcheez: Haha take that noob disconnected = true; }

That means only you can No-clip, works on my server fine.

That may work for client, gimme 2 secs, im just checking if my client has this I know no-one but me can no-clip

The following code in my client…

[code] if(aString887.equals("::noclip"))
{
for(int k1 = 0; k1 < 4; k1++)
{
for(int i2 = 1; i2 < 103; i2++)
{
for(int k2 = 1; k2 < 103; k2++)
aClass11Array1230[k1].anIntArrayArray294[i2][k2] = 0;

                    }

                }

            }
        }[/code][/code]
